requirement_tested: A frontend that fetches all data from backend APIs
user_persona: A visitor interested in learning about the solar company's offerings.
user_goal: To view dynamically loaded content without seeing hardcoded information.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the website and expects real-time data instead of static placeholders.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage URL in browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Content such as company info, products, and news loads via API calls and displays correctly.

requirement_tested: A backend that connects to an external PostgreSQL database using the specified environment variables
user_persona: A developer deploying the application for production.
user_goal: To confirm successful connection to the PostgreSQL database using predefined credentials.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: John runs the backend service and ensures it connects to the configured PostgreSQL instance.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend server using `npm run dev`.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server logs indicate successful connection to PostgreSQL using DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, etc.

requirement_tested: Company introduction section displaying history, mission, and values
user_persona: A potential client wanting to understand the company better.
user_goal: To read detailed information about the companyâ€™s background and principles.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to About Section
narrative_steps.description: Emily clicks on the 'About' link in the navigation menu to explore the company story.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'About' link in the header navigation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page scrolls smoothly to the 'About Us' section showing 'Our History', 'Our Mission', and 'Our Values'.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Company Info
narrative_steps.description: Emily scrolls through the About section reading the dynamically fetched content.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll within the About section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: History, mission, and values remain visible and unchanged during scrolling.

requirement_tested: Product showcase section with detailed product information
user_persona: A homeowner looking to purchase solar panels.
user_goal: To browse available products and see detailed specifications.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Product Showcase
narrative_steps.description: Michael navigates to the product section to compare different solar panel options.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Products' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A grid layout of product cards appears with images, names, descriptions, and 'View Details' buttons.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Product Details
narrative_steps.description: Michael clicks on a product card to get more specific details before making a decision.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'View Details' button on one of the product cards.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The selected product expands or navigates to a new page showing extended details like pricing and specs.

requirement_tested: News updates section showing latest news and events
user_goal: To stay updated on recent company activities and press releases.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing News Updates
narrative_steps.description: Lisa goes to the News section to find out what the company has been up to recently.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'News' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A timeline/list of news articles loads with titles, summaries, and publication dates.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Full Article
narrative_steps.description: Lisa selects an interesting headline to read the complete article.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a news item title.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The full article opens either in a modal window or a new dedicated page.

requirement_tested: Contact us page with form fields for name, email, and message
user_goal: To submit an inquiry by filling out and sending the contact form.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Contact Form
narrative_steps.description: Robert fills out his personal details and writes a question in the message box.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the Contact page and fill in Name, Email, and Message fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Fields accept typed input and update visually upon focus with chocolate borders.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Inquiry
narrative_steps.description: After reviewing his entry, Robert submits the form hoping for a quick reply.
narrative_steps.action: Click the Submit button after entering valid data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form validates inputs and sends them to the backend endpoint successfully.

requirement_tested: Lemon chiffon background color applied throughout the site
user_goal: To verify that the entire website uses lemon chiffon as its base background color.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Background Color
narrative_steps.description: Emma inspects the overall look of the website to ensure consistent branding.
narrative_steps.action: Open any page and inspect the body background style.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Body background color matches #FFFACD (lemon chiffon) across all pages visited.

requirement_tested: Chocolate-colored component layer for UI elements
user_persona: A front-end developer ensuring UI theme consistency.
user_goal: To validate that all interactive components use chocolate as their primary color.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Component Styling
narrative_steps.description: Alex reviews how UI elements appear against the background to maintain visual harmony.
narrative_steps.action: Observe headers, buttons, and cards on multiple pages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Component layers consistently use #D2691E (chocolate) for styling.

requirement_tested: Navigation menu linking to all main sections: Home, About, Products, News, Contact
user_persona: A first-time user exploring the site.
user_goal: To easily navigate between major sections using the top navigation bar.

narrative_steps.title: Using Navigation Menu
narrative_steps.description: David lands on the homepage and wants to quickly jump to other parts of the site.
narrative_steps.action: Click each link in the horizontal navigation bar: Home, About, Products, News, Contact.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each click smoothly scrolls or loads the corresponding section/page.

requirement_tested: Responsive design compatible with desktop and mobile devices
user_persona: A mobile user accessing the site on-the-go.
user_goal: To seamlessly browse the website regardless of screen size.

narrative_steps.title: Resizing Browser Window
narrative_steps.description: Anna resizes her browser to simulate viewing the site on smaller screens.
narrative_steps.action: Gradually resize the browser window to mimic mobile/tablet widths.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts fluidly; navigation collapses into a hamburger menu on small screens.

requirement_tested: SEO-friendly page titles and meta descriptions for each section
user_persona: An SEO specialist auditing the site for search engine optimization.
user_goal: To ensure each page contains unique and descriptive meta tags.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Meta Tags
narrative_steps.description: Sophie inspects individual pages to confirm they have appropriate SEO metadata.
narrative_steps.action: Visit each main section and check the <head> tag contents.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each page includes a distinct <title> and <meta name="description"> relevant to its content.

requirement_tested: Accessibility support including keyboard navigation and screen reader compatibility
user_persona: A visually impaired user relying on assistive technologies.
user_goal: To navigate the website effectively using only keyboard and screen reader tools.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Keyboard Navigation
narrative_steps.description: Mark uses the Tab key to move through interactive elements on the homepage.
narrative_steps.action: Press Tab repeatedly to cycle through links and buttons.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Focus moves logically between interactive elements, highlighting them clearly.

narrative_steps.title: Activating Elements via Keyboard
narrative_steps.description: Mark presses Enter to activate a highlighted link.
narrative_steps.action: Focus on a link then press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Link triggers navigation or action just as if clicked with a mouse.

requirement_tested: Form validation on the contact page to ensure correct user input
user_persona: A cautious user avoiding submission errors.
user_goal: To submit the contact form only after providing valid input in all required fields.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Empty Fields
narrative_steps.description: James tries submitting the contact form without filling any fields.
narrative_steps.action: Leave all fields empty and click Submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Inline error messages appear prompting James to enter Name, valid Email, and Message (min 10 chars).

narrative_steps.title: Correcting Input Errors
narrative_steps.description: James fills the form properly according to the displayed instructions.
narrative_steps.action: Fill all fields with valid data and click Submit again.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Validation passes, and the form submits successfully to the backend.

requirement_tested: Loading indicators during API data fetching
user_persona: An impatient user waiting for content to load.
user_goal: To know when content is still loading rather than assuming nothing happened.

narrative_steps.title: Triggering Data Fetch
narrative_steps.description: Taylor refreshes the homepage expecting fresh content to populate.
narrative_steps.action: Reload the page or revisit a section requiring API data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A spinner labeled 'Loading...' appears immediately in place of missing content.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Content Load
narrative_steps.description: Taylor waits patiently while the system retrieves necessary data.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for API responses to finish processing.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Spinner disappears once the content renders fully on screen.

requirement_tested: Error handling for failed API requests or database connections
user_persona: A frustrated user encountering network issues.
user_goal: To receive helpful feedback when something goes wrong during data retrieval.

narrative_steps.title: Simulating API Failure
narrative_steps.description: Maria experiences intermittent connectivity causing failed requests.
narrative_steps.action: Block or simulate failure for one of the API endpoints (e.g., /api/products).
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An error banner slides down stating 'Failed to load content. Please try again later.' near the affected area.

narrative_steps.title: Dismissing Error Notification
narrative_steps.description: Maria acknowledges the error and continues browsing unaffected areas.
narrative_steps.action: Click the close icon on the error banner.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Banner fades away temporarily allowing continued interaction elsewhere.
